reviews.review: This game is addictive. Th day I have purchased the game. I am playing only this game.
Ghost face mains are goated as fuck but other than that playing both Killer and Survivor is fun as hell, very good game.

Very fun game would recommend. The only downsides right now is the unbalanced killers and the some of the player base. On pc I havent encounter any "toxic" Players but on xbox Ive encountered killers who just camp or go after one player. Ive also seen survivers who dont help teammates or purpously lead the killer. I love this game and wish people werent like this. Playing a killer isnt that fun either.  I dont personally like when survivors all hangout at the exit and just teabag the whole time and when you get close they just leave.

Great game if you love horror multiplayer games where you can not only play as a human/survivor but also the monster/killer. Yes it can feel repetitive at times, but that didn't really take away from my experience. Almost every game you get into, you go against a different killer which arises different strategies per game with the rare occasion of having a Ghostface or a Hillbilly two games in a row. Also, playing with friends is great! I have had so many laughs with my friends just juking the killer or messing with them in various ways. You can also play with your friends as a killer in the custom gamemode although it doesn't randomly pick a killer for you, you must pick it before-hand and have you friends switch to killer. When the game starts to get old they release a new killer and two survivors along with a new map which keeps it feeling fresh. It is overall a great game and I would highly recommend, especially with friends.

ight played both sides now everything kinda fair. kinda. still some strong ass surv perks but they just trying to live lol

I love this game, But just to be clear there are a few issues. I'll leave a list of pros and cons. I'd also like to mention that the game is pretty different from most games you'll find on steam, as it doesn't follow a strict formula, and doesn't really follow a genre very well. So I would encourage you to watch some gameplay and talk to people about the game before buying it, since the game will probably not be what you're expecting if you don't.

Pros:
- kinda scary for your first few games as survivor
- the game is pretty unique, as it doesn't follow a distinct formula like a lot of AAA games.
- graphics are kinda cool i guess
- fun to play survivor with friends, as teamwork is required in a good team of survivors.
- probably some other stuff
Cons:
- hitboxes are absurdly large, which is a real pain for a lot of survivors, and for good reason.
- certain killers (bubba, spirit, trickster, etc.) are pretty unbalanced. some are absurdly good, and some aren't
- all characters in the game are a pain to level up, but this problem is completely removed once you've levelled all of them up to max, as the levels never reset.
- probably some other stuff

EDIT: the devs don't care about their game and they make it very clear. I wouldn't recommend buying this game in hopes that it will get better because I promise you that it won't. Go play VHS instead, it's a much better option.

(Please read this if you understand the basics of dbd. Also I was writing this of pure anger so I might have some word miss spilled in this review)
Here is some list of thing reason to not buy the game 
1.  Bad start: When you start playing survivors you're going to get face camped or tunnels because the killer is also new and wants at least 1 kill ever to match. 
2. Bad matchmaking: Right now (when I am making this) it is terrible. Sometime you get the same skill level or some time you're going to face a 4000 hours killer or a person who just bought the game.  
3. Play with friends: When you play with your friend the game goes to easy mode. If you play the game solo the game becomes a luck base game because you sometimes get a survivor who just hides in a corner or get a survivor who can loop the killer for the entire match.
4. Toxic community: If you play killer just to let you know you WILL get hate from the survivor
Calling the game ez and you're bad. Plus if you kill all of the toxic players they are going to say you're cheating and go to your profile and put rude stuff in your chat. So if you're going to play dbd I highly recommend privateing your profile. 

Here is one thing that is fun about dbd.
1.  Completely destroying the killer or survivor.

I can say, this game isn't for everyone. It's a party game of sorts for people who want to kill or be killed. More fun to play with people you know, otherwise you are paired with random people with a variety of skill levels. I've seen it all. To make matters worse, there is a ranking system which resets every 13th of each month. Heh... Friday the 13th. I would be lying if I said people didn't complain about how the game should be played. A bit of advice it to read everything and watch videos to learn how each survivor or killer works. Do the same for perks and items too. Not everything works the way it should. Most of the time, people are just complaining because they are getting outclassed or don't know how to out-witt another player. No one is THE BEST. Get over it, and learn from your mistakes. I will stop here. It's not for everyone, but it's certainly great for a kill your friends party game. And you might be playing for hours. There are so many killers to play from now. It's just awesome!!
